review: We use this with Plex to have access to our TVs and Movies around the house. Plus it's so nice that it's automatically tied to your Prime account, AND you can watch Hulu, Netflix, and listen to music on it too. We don't use the games too much, except for some Tetris and trivia, but I'd imagine you'd want the full Fire TV if you were gonna play real games.

review: The user interface is great.  I like the way it classifies the content and shows the art.  The interface flows well, much better than the native browser interface.  My problem is that the wi-fi adapter or the integrated player must be of a very low quality because I couldn't get enough bandwidth to stream anything and it wouldn't adapt to a lower profile/bit rate to get the content to flow.  I have both wired (W7 and W8 PCs) and wireless devices (iPad, iPhone, and Surface), all of which have no problem streaming Amazon Prime content.I returned the stick.  Thought about getting the Fire TV box, but not for $99.
